name: JungleShoot
description:
GamePlay: Hunt and kill as much militia soldiers as you can. How long can you stay alive?

Features:

• Guns: Find them in the jungle, your need lots of guns!

• KillCount: Keeps track of all your kills

• Jungle: A jungle filled with bad guys

• HardCore: No save/load, no health bar.

• Militia: Militia can only be killed temporarily. They will be back!
